ItemDescription.Description: Physical Protection and Health.
This item gives the owner an aura of magical and physical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - All allies within 70 units gain +20 Magical Protections and +25 HP5.

ItemDescription.Description: This item deals damage to nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Deals 40 Magical Damage per second to enemies within 25 units.

ShortDesc: Nearby enemies take damage over time.

ItemDescription.Description: This item reflects some of the damage taken from Basic Attacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Reflects 20% of all Basic Attack damage back to the attacker as Magical Damage.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes attackers to have a chance to be slowed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When hit by a Basic Attack, there is a 30% chance to slow your enemy's Movement Speed and Attack Speeds by 30% for 2 seconds.

ShortDesc: Chance to slow enemies when hit by their Basic Attacks.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical Power by 50 for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Physical Power by 20 for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

ItemDescription.Description: Increased Attack Speed.
This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the target's Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Basic Attacks against an enemy reduce your target's Physical Protection by 8% and an additional 6 points for 3 seconds (max 3 stacks).

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks reduce target's Physical Protection.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Basic Attacks to deal a percentage of the target's Health as additional damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - On Basic Attack hits, deal Physical Damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health. This only affects gods.

ShortDesc: Bonus damage based on target's maximum Health.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives increased Physical Lifesteal when at low Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you drop below 35% Health, you gain an additional 25% Physical Lifesteal for 5 seconds.  Can only occur once every 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Gain Physical Lifesteal when at low Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Magical Lifesteal.
This item gives the owner an aura of magical power and magical lifesteal.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - +20 Magical Power and 10% Magical Lifesteal to all allies within 70 units.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's next Basic Attack to deal additional damage after using an ability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Using an ability gives your next Basic Attack within the next 8 seconds +60% of your Magical Power as additional Magical Damage. The effect can only apply once every 3 seconds.

ShortDesc: Abilities increase damage on next Basic Attack.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's abilities to reduce the healing and regeneration of their targets.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your abilities have 40% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds.

ShortDesc: Enemies hit by your abilities have reduced healing and regen.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Magical Power based on the percentage of the owner's missing Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 1 additional Magical Power per 1% of your missing Health.

ShortDesc: Gain Magical Power as Health is lost.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals you over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 250 health over 25 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 150 mana over 25 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements with 60 units.  It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth.  It remains for 3 minutes or until killed.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Power by 25% for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Protections by 50 for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Penetration.
This item grants the owner physical penetration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Passive: All of your physical attacks gain 33% Physical Penetration.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the healing and regeneration of your target.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Basic Attacks have 40% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner reduced cooldown on their abilities.
This item grants the owner Physical Penetration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Each Basic Attack against towers and phoenixes grants a stack that increases your Attack Speed by 6% and Movement Speed by 3% for 2 seconds. (Max 5 stacks)

ShortDesc: Physical Penetration and Attack Speed vs. Towers and Phoenixes.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Movement Speed.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For 8 seconds after using an ability, your next basic attack will deal an additional 10% damage. The effect can only occur every 3 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional stacking Physical Power for kills.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +1 Physical Power per stack.  You receive 2 stacks for a god kill and 1 stack for a minion kill.  The stacks are halved on death.  (max. 50 stacks)

ShortDesc: Kills grant Physical Power that is lost on death.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Mana on kills and converts your Mana to additional Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 15 Mana per stack, and receive 5 stacks for a god kill and 1 stack for a minion kill (max 50 stacks). Additionally, 3% of your Mana is converted to Physical Power.

ShortDesc: Gain stacks of Mana from kills and converts Mana to Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner bonus damage on the next Basic Attack after using an ability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For 8s after using an ability, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 25% damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3s.

ShortDesc: Using abilities gives your next Basic Attack bonus damage based on Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item is for Magical users and gives them a chance to gain Health and Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy restores 10 Health and 10 Mana.

ShortDesc: Killing minions or camps restores Health and Mana.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Health and Mana every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 6 Health and 1 Mana.

ShortDesc: Basic attacks restore Health and Mana.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item increases durability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - All damage taken is reduced by 5.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage for 1s, preventing you from taking action.  Cooldown - 180s.

ItemDescription.Description: Invulnerability for 1.5 seconds.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage for 1.5s, preventing you from taking action.  Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage for 2s, preventing you from taking action.  After the invulnerability fades, you gain a 20% damage reduction buff for 4s.  Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage for 2s, preventing you from attacking but allowing you to move. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item damages up to 3 nearby minions or jungle monsters.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 480 damage, in a 15 unit radius, to a maximum of 3 enemy minions or jungle monsters. Objectives and Pets are always hit.  Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item damages nearby minions.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 480 damage, in a 15 unit radius, to a maximum of 3 enemy minions or jungle monsters. Objectives and Pets are always hit. Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item damages nearby minions.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 480 damage, in a 15 unit radius, to a maximum of 3 enemy minions or jungle monsters. Objectives and Pets are always hit. This will automatically kill the Fire Giant or Gold Fury if they are at or below 25% Health.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item stuns an enemy god.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 480 damage, in a 15 unit radius, to a maximum of 3 enemy minions or jungle monsters. Objectives and pets are always hit. Also, all enemies will be stunned for 1s in the radius. Cooldown - 90s.

ShortDesc: Using this item stuns an enemy god.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport short distances.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport short distances instantly.  You must have not dealt or taken damage for 5s before it can be used.  Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport short distances.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport short distances instantly.  You must have not dealt or taken damage for 4s before it can be used.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport short distances.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport short distances instantly.  You must have not dealt or taken damage for 3s before it can be used.  Also, you gain 40% Movement Speed for 1s after blinking.  Cooldown - 45s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport short distances.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport short distances instantly, even when in combat.  Cooldown - 180s.

ShortDesc: Can teleport while in or out of combat.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item debuffs the nearby enemies Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces all enemies Movement Speed by 20% in a 55 unit radius around you for 5s.  Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Enemy speed debuff
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces all enemies ground speed by 30% in a 55 foot radius around you for 5 seconds.  Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item debuffs the nearby enemies Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces all enemy gods Movement Speed by 40% in a 55 unit radius around you for 5s.  Their healing is also reduced by 100% for the duration.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item debuffs the nearby enemies Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces all enemy gods Movement Speed by 40% in a 55 unit radius around you for 5s. It will also reduce Attack Speed by 30% for the duration. Cooldown - 60s.

ShortDesc: Reduces enemy Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives all nearby allies a damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives all allied gods in a 70 ft radius a +10% Physical and Magical Power buff for 10 seconds.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ally damage buff
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives all allied gods in a 70 ft radius a +15% Physical and Magical Power buff for 10 seconds.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives all nearby allies a damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives all allied gods in a 70 ft radius a +20% Physical and Magical Power buff for 10 seconds. Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner a damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives the owner a +20% Physical and Magical Power buff for 10 seconds.  You also gain +10% Physical and Magical Penetration.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects from the owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 1s.  Cooldown - 180s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects from the owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s.  Cooldown - 135s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects from the owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 3s. This also reduces all god cooldowns by 3s. Cooldown - 90s

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner a movement speed buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases your ground speed by 30% for 4s.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner a movement speed buff. It also makes you immune to slows for the duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases your ground speed by 35% for 5s. It also makes you immune to slows for the duration.  Cooldown - 60s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner a movement speed buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases your ground speed by 40% for 6s.  It also makes you immune to slows for the duration, and you no longer have the movement penalty while firing.  Cooldown - 60s.

ShortDesc: Immune to slows and removes attack penalty.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item buffs the nearby allies Movement Speed and increases healing received.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item buffs all allies Movement Speed by 40% in a 70 unit radius for 6s and makes them immune to slows.  Their healing is also increased by 25% for the duration.  Cooldown - 90s.

ShortDesc: Increases ally Movement Speed and healing.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives attack speed and lifesteal.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Upon activation you gain +30% Attack Speed, +35% Lifesteal, and 30% Movement Speed for 5s. You take +30% additional damage from all sources while this is active. Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item restores the owner's Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 75% of the owner's maximum Mana and gives them 15 MP5 for 15 seconds.  Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner mana heal.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item heals the owner's mana by 75% of their maximum mana and gives them 30 MP5 for 30 seconds.  Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item restores Mana and Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 75% of your maximum Mana and grants +45 MP5 for 60s. Additionally, you are healed for 30% of your missing Health. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item restores Mana and Health to the owner and all nearby allies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives you +45 MP5 for 60s and restores 35% of maximum Mana to you and your teammates. This also heals you and your teammates for 15% of your maximum Health.  Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional benefits from killing jungle camp monsters.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal +10 True Damage and your Abilities +10% Damage versus Jungle Camps. You are healed for 10% of a Camp's max Health, and if you have an ally nearby, you get the normal gold reward as if you were solo.

ShortDesc: Mana and healing while in the Jungle.

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements and other wards within 60 units.  It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth.  It remains for 3 minutes or until killed. Can only carry one at a time.
PASSIVE - Being within range 60 of a minion death without dealing the killing blow awards +4 bonus gold, and also restores +10 Health and +5 Mana.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner and his allies a Protections buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives the owner and his allies +15 Protections for 5 seconds.  Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner and his allies a Protections buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives the owner and his allies a +30 Protections buff for 5 seconds.  Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item gives the owner and his allies a Protection buff and Damage Mitigation.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item gives the owner and his allies a +45 Magical and Physical Protections for 5 seconds.  Also, all damage taken is reduced by 15%.  Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: This is an item that allows you to place a ward every so often.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is an item that allows you to place a ward every 90 seconds, allowing you to see normal enemy movements where you place it.  It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth.  It remains for 3 minutes or until killed.

ShortDesc: Allows free placing of vision Wards.

ItemDescription.Description: This is an item that allows you to place a ward every so often.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is an item that allows you to place a ward every 60 seconds, allowing you to see normal enemy movements where you place it. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. It remains for 3 minutes or until killed.

ItemDescription.Description: This is an item that allows you to place a ward every so often.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is an item that allows you to place a sentry ward every 60 seconds, allowing you to see normal enemy movements and wards where you place it. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. It remains for 3 minutes or until killed.

ShortDesc: Allows placement of free sentry wards.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower while being unable to move.  Any damage interrupts the teleport.  Cooldown - 240s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower while being unable to move.  Any damage interrupts the teleport.  Cooldown - 180s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower or ward, without damage interruption.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower or ward, without damage interruption, while being unable to move.  You are still interrupted by hard crowd control.  Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Teleport to an allied tower or ward without damage interruption.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied god.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied god while being unable to move. Any damage interrupts the teleport. Cooldown - 240s.

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases your Critical Strike Chance. Critical Strikes deal additional damage over time.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Physical Power and Physical Lifesteal every time they hit with a Basic Attack.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Magical Protection.

ShortDesc: Additional protection when hit by damaging ability

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power debuff aura.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - All enemies within range 55 have their Magical Power reduced by 50.

ItemDescription.Description: The owner gains additional physical power and Crowd Control Reduction as they build stacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You permanently gain +.5 Physical Power and +.2% Cooldown Reduction per stack, and receive 5 stacks per god kill and 1 stack per minion kill. (max. 60 stacks)

ShortDesc: Gain Physical Power and Cooldown Reduction from kills.

ItemDescription.Description: This item protects you from critical hits.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Prevents the next hit of Critical Strike Damage from a Basic Attack that hits you, and you gain +40 Magical Power for 3 seconds if this occurs. This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Grants Magical Power, Physical Protection, and Magical Penetration.

ItemDescription.Description: Gives protection to gods you heal.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Any god affected by your heals gains +20 Physical Protection and +20 Magical Protection for 5 seconds. Cannot activate on the same target again for 10s.

ShortDesc: Gives protection to gods you heal.

ItemDescription.Description: This item has a chance to cause chain lightning, damaging nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every fourth Basic Attack triggers a chain lightning, damaging the target and up to 4 nearby enemies for 20 physical damage. This cannot trigger more than once every 1s.

ShortDesc: Has a chance to trigger chain lightning.

ItemDescription.Description: This item has a chance to cause chain lightning, damaging nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every fourth Basic Attack triggers a chain lightning, damaging the target and up to 4 nearby enemies for 30 damage +50% of your total Physical Power.

ShortDesc: Has a chance to trigger chain lightning.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every successful Basic Attack increases your Physical Power by 10 and reduces your target's Physical Power from items by 10, for 3s. (Max 3 Stacks)

ShortDesc: Attack Speed and Physical Power stealing.

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 40% of all damage you take for the next 5s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Upon activation you reflect 40% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next 5s back to its owner as Magical Damage. While this is active, enemies cannot Lifesteal from you.  Cooldown - 60s.
PASSIVE - Restores 4% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds.
